name: Internal RoboHelp File
summary: Learn about .HPR files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: You will most likely never see the HPR file since they are used internally by RoboHelp. They are not meant to be opened manually.

description: Internal help file used by RoboHelp, an application used to create help and policy content across mobile devices; contains configuration information used internally when opening and saving RoboHelp projects.
